name: RX Racing 2021 Pro
description:
RX Racing 2021 Pro is an arcade rallycross game where you can drive the drivers of the year 2021 in different categories. The goal is very simple, you take a driver and try to win the race. But be careful because depending on the driver you take, it will be more difficult to win the race.

Feature :

3 Modes : Time Attack , Race and Season

Time Attack :

Train on one of the 29 circuits for improve yourself or play on the different playgrounds that are available on some circuits.

Race :

There are more than 40 pilots who are divided into more than 20 teams. So choose a driver and try to lead him to victory.

Season :

- Season 2021 of INRX 10 drivers , 7 teams and 8 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 7 races

- Season 2021 of UK Rallycross 12 drivers , 5 teams and 6 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 5 races

- Season 2021 of RNordic 11 drivers 9 teams and 6 tracks

Race with 5-6 cars Season 4 races

- Season 2021 of SARX 8 drivers 5 teams and 5 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 3 races

- Season 2021 of ARC 15 drivers 7 teams and 9 tracks

Race with 7-8 cars Season 5 races ARC Classic 4 races

- 7 Songs

Only keyboards and mouse

This game includes :

- Fake names - Fake tracks - Fake teams - Fake cars

No licence
